video.title: Chilling Adventures of Sabrina
video.synopsis: Magic and mischief collide as half-human, half-witch Sabrina navigates between two worlds: mortal teen life and her family's legacy, the Church of Night.

episodes.synopsis: While Greendale readies for a Halloween eclipse, Sabrina faces a crucial decision and Harvey makes an unexpected declaration.
episodes.title: Chapter One: October Country

episodes.synopsis: A legendary guest visits Spellman Mortuary, Ambrose explores a grim revelation, and Sabrina stuns the coven with a shocking announcement.
episodes.title: Chapter Two: The Dark Baptism

episodes.synopsis: As Sabrina confronts a long line of family secrets, Harvey faces turmoil at home -- and shares a secret of his own.
episodes.title: Chapter Three: The Trial of Sabrina Spellman

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina takes a weekend trip. Father Blackwood poses a pivotal question. Roz and Susie stage an impromptu -- and unnerving -- sleepover.
episodes.title: Chapter Four: Witch Academy

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious demon wreaks havoc on Spellman Mortuary. Sabrina goes rogue and puts her powers to the test.
episodes.title: Chapter Five: Dreams in a Witch House

episodes.synopsis: Harvey, Roz and Susie explore a mysterious force of evil. Sabrina digs deeper into Ms. Wardwell's intentions. Hilda pursues a new beginning.
episodes.title: Chapter Six: An Exorcism in Greendale

episodes.synopsis: The coven prepares for an annual ritual as Harvey takes part in a Kinkle family tradition. Sabrina grows suspicious of Lady Blackwood.
episodes.title: Chapter Seven: Feast of Feasts

episodes.synopsis: A disaster rattles the Greendale community. Desperate to help, Sabrina attempts a new kind of dark magic -- with the assistance of an unusual ally.
episodes.title: Chapter Eight: The Burial

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina recruits Roz for a crucial mission. Susie reconnects with her past. Lord Blackwood challenges Aunt Zelda's authority.
episodes.title: Chapter Nine: The Returned Man

episodes.synopsis: A revolutionary attack divides the witches and mortals of Greendale, and Sabrina braces for a life-changing choice.
episodes.title: Chapter Ten: The Witching Hour

episodes.synopsis: As the winter solstice approaches, Sabrina orchestrates an emotional séance with serious consequences, and Susie's merry plans turn menacing.
episodes.title: Chapter Eleven: A Midwinter's Tale

episodes.synopsis: As Sabrina prepares for a spellbinding showcase, Susie embraces a series of new beginnings, and Ms. Wardwell finds greater purpose at Baxter High.
episodes.title: Chapter Twelve: "The Epiphany"

episodes.synopsis: A sinister guest visits Spellman Mortuary. Theo faces a cast of cruel critics, and Roz and Harvey pursue an extra-steamy school assignment.
episodes.title: Chapter Thirteen: "The Passion of Sabrina Spellman"

episodes.synopsis: Love and lust sweep through Greendale as Harvey surprises Roz with a sweet gift, and Sabrina explores a romantic ritual ... and her feelings for Nick.
episodes.title: Chapter Fourteen: "Lupercalia"

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina, Theo, Roz and others attempt to navigate the lines between fact, fiction and fate when a mysterious stranger sets up shop in Cerberus Books.
episodes.title: Chapter Fifteen: "Doctor Cerberus's House of Horror"

episodes.synopsis: Tensions rise as Zelda and Father Blackwood's union draws near. Amid the chaos, Sabrina greets a familiar vision and Ambrose uncovers a dark truth.
episodes.title: Chapter Sixteen: Blackwood

episodes.synopsis: As Hilda and Sabrina attempt to save Ambrose, Ms. Wardwell considers a crucial move, and a violent group of witch hunters targets the Church of Night.
episodes.title: Chapter Seventeen: The Missionaries

episodes.synopsis: On the heels of a most perplexing spectacle, Sabrina dives deeper into her newfound power, and Zelda slips into the role of Lady Blackwood.
episodes.title: Chapter Eighteen: The Miracles of Sabrina Spellman

episodes.synopsis: An ominous discovery leads to a desperate search for answers -- and a risky spell for Sabrina. Meanwhile, Father Blackwood makes a bold announcement.
episodes.title: Chapter Nineteen: The Mandrake

episodes.synopsis: Light and night cross paths once more as Greendale faces the Dark Lord's prophecy and Prudence challenges Father Blackwood’s ruthless plan.
episodes.title: Chapter Twenty: The Mephisto Waltz

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina recruits Roz, Harvey and Theo for an emotional mission. Prudence and Ambrose travel to New Orleans. Ms. Wardwell returns to Baxter High.
episodes.title: Chapter Twenty-One: The Hellbound Heart

episodes.synopsis: In Greendale, Sabrina explores a new hobby ... and a disturbing duty. Elsewhere, Prudence and Ambrose continue their search for Father Blackwood.
episodes.title: Chapter Twenty-Two: Drag Me to Hell

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina visits a mysterious (and familiar) town. Zelda aims to restore order at the academy. A carnival creates buzz in Greendale. Theo takes a chance.
episodes.title: Chapter Twenty-Three: Heavy Is the Crown

episodes.synopsis: The coven celebrates a festive tradition -- and crosses paths with unexpected guests. Nick struggles to strike a balance between pleasure and pain.
episodes.title: Chapter Twenty-Four: The Hare Moon

episodes.synopsis: Ambrose treats Nick's affliction while Harvey and Theo tend to Roz. Meanwhile, Sabrina and Caliban continue in their unholy regalia challenge.
episodes.title: Chapter Twenty-Five: The Devil Within

episodes.synopsis: Zelda attempts to forge a supernatural alliance, Sabrina and the gang work with Caliban, and Hilda's transformation takes a terrifying turn.
episodes.title: Chapter Twenty-Six: All of Them Witches

episodes.synopsis: On the heels of tragedy, the Spellmans receive a grim omen. Blackwood seeks vengeance. Sabrina prepares for her final challenge against Caliban.
episodes.title: Chapter Twenty-Seven: The Judas Kiss

episodes.synopsis: The lines between past, present and future blur as Sabrina stages an act of heroic restoration. But will her powers prove to be enough?
episodes.title: Chapter Twenty-Eight: Sabrina Is Legend

episodes.synopsis: As an all-consuming darkness trickles into town, Sabrina grapples with feeling like the odd witch out — and makes a risky plan for a whirlwind trip.
episodes.title: Chapter Twenty-Nine: The Eldritch Dark

episodes.synopsis: A grim visitor sends Roz and Harvey into a panic. Elsewhere, Sabrina reconnects with an enemy from her past, and Aunt Hilda's wedding day arrives.
episodes.title: Chapter Thirty: The Uninvited

episodes.synopsis: The next terror graces Greendale. Sabrina bonds with a new classmate… and finds herself in a squeamish predicament. Roz uncovers a shocking truth.
episodes.title: Chapter Thirty-One: The Weird

episodes.synopsis: Panic turns political as Sabrina and Roz run for Baxter High co-presidents. Harvey struggles with Roz's reveal. Blackwood takes control of the terror.
episodes.title: Chapter Thirty-Two: The Imp of the Perverse

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina encounters a surprise at school — and faces a pivotal decision. Theo explores the perks and pitfalls of Robin's time in the mortal world.
episodes.title: Chapter Thirty-Three: Deus Ex Machina

episodes.synopsis: As Sabrina longs for a piece of her past, vengeful visitors return to Greendale. The Fright Club competes in a life-or-death battle of the bands.
episodes.title: Chapter Thirty-Four: The Returned

episodes.synopsis: In an alternate universe, Sabrina Morningstar meets a cast of familiar faces — and investigates the thin line between fact and fiction.
episodes.title: Chapter Thirty-Five: The Endless

episodes.synopsis: The darkest days of the void arrive as Sabrina struggles with grief and regret. Can she summon the strength to overcome an endless cycle of destruction?
episodes.title: Chapter Thirty-Six: At the Mountains of Madness
